title: Similar Fonts
content:
Hi,

Hoping someone can help! I’m looking for a similar free font to Meta font which runs to £161.00, way too much for my client and us, as we would never use it again.

Any help appreciated.

Kindest Regards  
Cass

 [‹ PC Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905082636/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44775 "Go to previous forum topic") [Impossible to get Adrian Frutiger's "Type, Sign, Symbol" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905082636/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44739 "Go to next forum topic")

Hi All,

Thank you for your help, it’s really appreciated.

Kindest Regards  
Cass
Cass - I’m interested to know where you saw the £161.00 price. We’d like to make FontFont pricing as clear as possible.

Hi Stephen,

I think it was Fonts.com or it could have been ITC. I’ve replicated the original font and my client is happy with it, so in the end I saved us both money. (Photoshop is a wonderful thing ;))

As it was only for three letters I didn’t see the point of buying it, as it will never be used again.

Kindest Regards  
Cass
